headline: Post-Brexit Border Test Leads to a 5-Mile Traffic Jam
text: LONDON — In March of last year, French customs agents highlighted the mayhem that Britain’s departure from the European Union was likely to cause for drivers and workers at ports, train stations and the tunnel that links Britain and France.
snippet: French border officials were holding a trial run of immigration procedures that could come into effect if Britain and the European Union don’t reach a trade deal by the end of December.
